Articles.Content:
I'm not sure which subforum to put this in so I put it here. Feel free to move it if necessary.

As of yesterday I'm not receiving any email notifications to subscribed threads. I've checked to see if they're going into my junk mail folder and they aren't. I've also gone through my forum settings and everything is set to instant email notification. I've also checked that my email address is the right one, it is. I've sent myself a PM and I receive it here but there's no email notification.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

I registered today on this forum and I did not received my confirmation mail (the one with the link to click-on to confirm my account creation).

Regards.
Moved to the Kerbal Network forum, the place for all your forum-related questions.

I haven't gotten a subscription email in what feels like weeks, so you're certainly not alone. I typically have already seen whatever posts it was going to tell me about, which may be related, so I haven't missed them that much.
Seems to be working now. Thanks!
